prompts: Create a Pokemon that resembles a spiky ball with metallic features and vibrant green accents.
Imagine a Pokemon that is made of iron and has a round shape with sharp spikes on top.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a small, armored ball with a gray body and green spikes.
Show me a steel-type Pokemon with a rocky appearance and a playful yet defensive personality.
Generate a Pokemon that blends into a forest environment with its earthy colors and spiked body.
Make a Pokemon that is tough and durable, resembling a small fortress with sharp protrusions.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies resilience and strength, with a unique spherical shape and natural armor.
